titles.title: Flexible Licensing Compliance for Nonprofit Housing Employees Act of 2010
To delay the implementation of the licensing requirements under the S.A.F.E. Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 4/21/2010--Introduced. Flexible Licensing Compliance for Nonprofit Housing Employees Act of 2010 - Delays until January 1, 2011, the effective date of any regulations of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) regarding licensing or registration requirements under the S.A.F.E Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 for engaging in the business of a loan originator.
